title: Kris Smith and pregnant girlfriend Sarah Boulazeris cuddle up to daughter Mila at airport
text:
Sarah Boulazeris, 28, is eight-months pregnant with her second child to model Kris Smith, 40.

And on Friday, the loved-up couple were all smiles as they flew home to Melbourne with their 10-month-old daughter Mila Elle.

Dressed casually for the flight, Sarah and Kris were seen departing Adelaide airport with their adorable youngster in their arms.

Baby on board! Kris Smith and pregnant girlfriend Sarah Boulazeris cuddled up to daughter Mila at Adelaide airport on Friday as they prepared to fly home to Melbourne

The doting parents were in Adelaide for a brief work trip, as Kris had emceed at the 175th anniversary event for Penfolds winery on Thursday night.

Sarah, who is due to welcome the couple's second child later this year, dressed her growing bump in a black T-shirt and green trackpants.

The personal trainer looked radiant as she went makeup-free to show off her glowing complexion.

She's glowing! Makeup-free Sarah, who is due to welcome the couple's second child later this year, dressed her growing bump in a black T-shirt and green trackpants

She was seen carrying little Mila in her arms as she pushed the child's empty stroller across the terminal in a pair of stylish kicks.

Kris soon took hold of their daughter as they proceeded to check in their luggage for the flight.

The Myer model was also dressed casually, with ripped jeans and a black T-shirt.

Daddy's little girl: Kris soon took hold of their daughter as they proceeded to check in their luggage for the flight

Despite Kris looking to have accidentally placed his top on inside out, he was actually wearing an $80 designer T-shirt by Anti-Order.

Kris and Sarah have been dating since 2017, and became the proud parents to their first child together - daughter Mila Elle - in December 2018.

In addition to Mila, Kris shares an eight-year-old son, Ethan, with former girlfriend, performer Dannii Minogue.

Kris and Sarah have been dating since 2017, not long after Kris split with model Maddy King.

Before that, the English hunk was in a long-term relationship with Dannii Minogue from 2008 to 2012.
